name: Capybara Games
detail:
Capybara Games is an independent game studio based out of Toronto, Canada. It focuses on the development of iPhone, Nintendo DS, and downloadable console games. The studio was founded in 2003 from a collection of Toronto IGDA members.
Capybara's mascot is a mustachioed man named Hank Hudson, who can be found in most of their games.
